Uses of Class
io.atomix.primitive.PrimitiveState

  • Packages that use PrimitiveState 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.primitive
    Provides classes and interfaces for defining and managing primitive types.
    io.atomix.primitive.proxy
    Provides interfaces for operating on primitive services via Java proxies.
    io.atomix.primitive.session
    Provides classes and interfaces for managing primitive sessions.
    io.atomix.protocols.backup.session
    Provides a SessionClient implementation for primary-backup.

    • Uses of PrimitiveState in io.atomix.primitive

      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static PrimitiveState[] PrimitiveState.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Method parameters in io.atomix.primitive with type arguments of type PrimitiveState 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AbstractAsyncPrimitive.addStateChangeListener​(Consumer<PrimitiveState> listener)  
      default void DistributedPrimitive.addStateChangeListener​(Consumer<PrimitiveState> listener)
      Registers a listener to be called when the primitive's state changes.
      void AbstractAsyncPrimitive.removeStateChangeListener​(Consumer<PrimitiveState> listener)  
      default void DistributedPrimitive.removeStateChangeListener​(Consumer<PrimitiveState> listener)
      Unregisters a previously registered listener to be called when the primitive's state changes.
